description: Send a trap about external semaphore alarm.
The ID of the external input alarm channel.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUExternalInputAlarmChannelID

description: Send a trap about video loss. Video loss is that no video
signal is inputted to the EC.
The name of the video channel.
It is suggested that the name includes the channel ID
information.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECVideoChannelName

description: Send a trap about video recovery after loss.
The name of the video channel.
It is suggested that the name includes the channel ID
information.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECVideoChannelName

description: Send a trap about motion detection.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECManMotionDetectTrap HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECVideoChannelName s EXAMPLE HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1 u 9999 HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1 u 9999 HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2 u 9999 HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2 u 9999

description: The name of the video channel.
It is suggested that the name includes the channel ID
information.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECVideoChannelName

description: The horizontal coordinate of top left point of the motion
detection region.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1

description: The vertical coordinate of top left point of the motion
detection region.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1

description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the
motion detection region.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2

description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the
motion detection region.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2

description: Send a trap when EC can not register the CMS.

event.Summary: EC unable to register the CMS

description: The IP address of the CMS.
All zero address indicates the CMS address is not configured.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUCMSAddr

description: Send a trap when the connection with the CMS breaks down.
The IP address of the CMS.
All zero address indicates the CMS address is not configured.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUCMSAddr

description: Send a trap when the connection with the version server breaks
down or can not create.
The IP address of the version server.
All zero address indicates the version server is not configured
or does not support remote upgrade.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUVersionServerAddr

description: Send a trap about flash failure.
Send a trap when a camera is sheltered.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECManCameraShelterTrap HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECVideoChannelName s EXAMPLE HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1 u 9999 HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1 u 9999 HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2 u 9999 HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2 u 9999

description: The name of the video channel.
It is suggested that the name includes the channel ID
information.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECVideoChannelName

description: The horizontal coordinate of top left point of the motion
detection region.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateX1

description: The vertical coordinate of top left point of the motion
detection region.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateY1

description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the
motion detection region.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateX2

description: The horizontal coordinate of botton right point of the
motion detection region.
variables.name: HH3C-PU-MAN-MIB::hh3cPUECRegionCoordinateY2
